ihala wame sita, dakunu palathe aagnyapathi washayen katayuthu kala karnal lakshman algama, jawipe 2wani karalle hambanthota, mathara, galla saha kaluthara disthrik athulath dakunu kalapaye deshapalana saha sannaddha nayakayawu jawipe pradhana lekam upathissa gamanayaka, jawipe magin ghathanayakala galla disthrikkaye kirthimath wama nayakayekuwu jorj rathnayaka saha nasasapa disthrik nayakayekuwu waligama daglas kaluaarachch, jawipe galla disa lekamwarun washayen kalak katayuthu kala madhyama karaka sabhikayinwana dharmawardhana munasinha saha gamini wijegunasekara, 1989 galla disthrik jawipe sannaddha nayakayawa siti ke. ti. es. dewananda, jawipe shishya anshaye galu disthrikk nayakayekuwa siti kalani sarasawiye sisu habaraduwe nihal jayawira, katunayaka praharayata sambandhawimen pasu galle sannaddha kriyakarakamwalata ekwu bawata aarakshaka ansha pawasana jawipe kriyakarikayin wana ragama ke.
